alert.note: Alert for McDonough; Warren (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 10:29PM CDT until May 06 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Warren County in west central Illinois... McDonough County in west central Illinois... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1029 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Larchland to Sciota to near Webster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Macomb, Roseville, Good Hope, Western Illinois University, Spring Lake, Ormonde, McDonough County 4-H Grounds and Warren County Fairgrounds around 1035 PM CDT. Walnut Grove, Berwick, Macomb Municipal Airport and Scottsburg around 1040 PM CDT. Bardolph, Fandon and Greenbush around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Bushnell, New Philadelphia, Adair, Doddsville, Industry and Pennington Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
